Name: Simp Attack
About the game: Simp Attack is a hack and slash game where you play as a Waifu and must defend against the oncoming waves of simps. They will try and rip off your cloths and defeat you, so you must give it all you have to defeat the simps! Features Multiple worlds and maps to play on Three different Waifus to choose from Endless waves to fight against, leaving a ton of re-playability
